about.description:
pip-package of what was previously found in BOUT-dev/tools/pylib/boututils
Note that BOUT-dev/tools/pylib/boututils will likely be replaced by this
repo in BOUT++ v4.4.0.
> **NOTE**: This package will likely be superseded by xBOUT in the near future

pip-package of what was previously found in BOUT-dev/tools/pylib/boututils
Note that BOUT-dev/tools/pylib/boututils will likely be replaced by this
repo in BOUT++ v4.4.0.
> **NOTE**: This package will likely be superseded by xBOUT in the near future

name: boututils
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "boututils" %}
{% set version = "0.1.4" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: ed8e8778cea7f2335a22ddab8294f3983a82eca10c9d8357936a3102abef4563

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.0
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.0
    - numpy
    - matplotlib-base
    - scipy
    - h5py
    - future
    - bunch
    - netcdf4

test:
  imports:
    - boututils
  requires:
    - pytest
  source_files:
    - test
  commands:
    - pytest

about:
  home: https://github.com/boutproject/boututils
  license: LGPL-3.0-only
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Python utilities for BOUT++
  description: |
    pip-package of what was previously found in BOUT-dev/tools/pylib/boututils
    Note that BOUT-dev/tools/pylib/boututils will likely be replaced by this
    repo in BOUT++ v4.4.0.
    > **NOTE**: This package will likely be superseded by xBOUT in the near future
  dev_url: https://github.com/boutproject/boututils

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - johnomotani
    - ZedThree
    - loeiten
